headline: Suit Can Proceed Against Art Magazine
abstract: A New York appeals court clears the way for some of a former magazine employee’s claims of retaliation against her in a #MeToo case.
lead_paragraph: In a ruling on one of the art world’s notable #MeToo lawsuits, a court found that Artforum magazine can be held responsible for retaliation against a former employee — but that Knight Landesman, the influential former publisher whom the employee accused of sexual harassment, legally remains in the clear.
